messages.subject: Calling all youngsters, tweens, and teens
messages.msgSnippet: Calling on all homeschooled/unschooled youngsters,tween,and teens.....join us in a writing prompt to be publshed in the Maryland Homeschool News online! The
messages.messageBody:
Calling on all homeschooled/unschooled youngsters,tween,and
teens.....join us in a writing prompt to be publshed in the Maryland
Homeschool News online!

The theme this time is:

Something is rotten in your refrigerator. Write a short story or a
play scene in which the
condiments residing in the door shelves plot to take over the prime
real estate on the top shelf, front and center. Will milk be spilled?
(And who shall be crying?)



Please send your written story or play scene to
marylandhomeschoolnewsteenreviews@...



no later than March 11th.



I will start publishing them on March 12th, then more on March 16th.

Depending on how many are recieved, we may have to publsih them on
March 18th as well.



Keep checking the site to see if yours has been publsihed during that
time!

http://marylandhomeschoolnews.webs.com/index.htm

and click on teen reviews!



Earlene Sorrells
